Package me.donkeycore.dpl.statement

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IStatement
    Interface for statements
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Debug
    Control whether debug messages should be displayed
    Syntax: @debug bool
    bool A boolean value, determining if debug messages appear
    Input
    Receive raw input from the user
    Syntax: @input
    Logger
    Logs messages to console
    Logger.Debug
    Log a debug message to console
    Syntax: @log:debug message
    message The message to display
    Logger.Error
    Log a non-fatal error message to console
    Syntax: @log:error message
    message The message to display
    Logger.Fatal
    Record a fatal error message to console.
    Logger.Info
    Logs an information message to console
    Syntax: @log:info message
    message The message to display
    Logger.Warning
    Logs a warning message to console
    Syntax: @log:warning message
    message The message to display
    Print
    Display a message in the console, without a line break.
    Println
    Display a message in the console, with a linebreak.
    Statement
    Main statement and method handler
    Stop
    Stop the program
    Syntax: stop
    Syntax: stop errno
    errno The exit code
    Wait
    Wait for a specified period of time
    Syntax: wait(milliseconds)
    millseconds The amount of millseconds to wait
